channel.title: Compile Error Please Help!

item.title: Compile Error Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @Doomah99 Doomah99
item.description:
@Doomah99 wrote:

I get this error when I compile ?

Java\Gui.java:182: error: class, interface, or enum expected private static boolean isApplet = false; ^ Java\Gui.java:183: error: class, interface, or enum expected public int theme; ^ Java\Gui.java:184: error: class, interface, or enum expected protected static JTextArea textArea; ^ Java\Gui.java:185: error: class, interface, or enum expected protected JScrollPane scrollPane; ^ Java\Gui.java:186: error: class, interface, or enum expected private static final String newline = "\n"; ^ Java\Gui.java:187: error: class, interface, or enum expected public static String browserPath = "C:/Program Files/Internet Explorer/iexpl ore.exe"; ^ Java\Gui.java:188: error: class, interface, or enum expected public static String url = "implicitpk.enjin.com"; ^ Java\Gui.java:189: error: class, interface, or enum expected private JTabbedPane jTabbedPane1; ^ Java\Gui.java:190: error: class, interface, or enum expected private String frameTitle = "ImplicitPk"; ^ Java\Gui.java:191: error: class, interface, or enum expected public JFrame frame; ^ Java\Gui.java:193: error: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ 11 errors Press any key to continue . . .

This is the line it is talking about

[code]}

private static boolean isApplet = false;
public int theme;
protected static JTextArea textArea;
protected JScrollPane scrollPane;
private static final String newline = "\n";
public static String browserPath = "C:/Program Files/Internet Explorer/iexplore.exe";
public static String url = "implicitpk.enjin.com";
private JTabbedPane jTabbedPane1;
private String frameTitle = "ImplicitPk";
public JFrame frame;

}

[/code]

Read full topic
